name: calculator-microservice-load-tests
description: Load testing scripts for calculator microservice

scripts.test:load:report: artillery run --output report.json load-test.yaml && artillery report report.json
scripts.test:quick:report: artillery run --output report-quick.json load-test-quick.yaml && artillery report report-quick.json
scripts.test:soak:report: artillery run --output report-soak.json load-test-soak.yaml && artillery report report-soak.json
scripts.test:all: npm run test:quick && npm run test:load
